terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.introDescription: Please read these terms carefully before using GUILD. By using our service, you agree to be bound by these terms.
terms.mustAccept: You must accept the terms and conditions to continue
terms.acceptanceText: I have read and agree to the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy
terms.declineWarning: You must accept the terms to use GUILD. Are you sure you want to decline?
terms.acceptanceError: Failed to save acceptance. Please try again.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content1: By accessing and using GUILD, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
acceptance.content2: If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
acceptance.content3: These terms apply to all users of the service, including without limitation users who are browsers, vendors, customers, merchants, and contributors of content.

services.title: Description of Service
services.content1: GUILD is a freelancing platform that connects skilled professionals with clients seeking services.
services.content2: Our platform facilitates job postings, applications, project management, and secure payments.
services.content3: We provide guild functionality for collaborative work and skill development.
services.content4: GUILD reserves the right to modify or discontinue the service at any time without notice.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.content1: You are responsible for safeguarding the password and for maintaining the confidentiality of your account.
userAccounts.content2: You are fully responsible for all activities that occur under your account.
userAccounts.content3: You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security.

payments.title: Payments and Fees
payments.content1: GUILD charges service fees for completed transactions as outlined in our fee schedule.
payments.content2: All payments are processed securely through our approved payment partners.
payments.content3: Refunds are subject to our refund policy and dispute resolution process.
payments.content4: Users are responsible for any applicable taxes on their earnings or payments.

guilds.title: Guild System
guilds.content1: Guilds are collaborative groups where members can share projects and develop skills together.
guilds.content2: Guild Masters have administrative control over their guilds and are responsible for member conduct.
guilds.content3: Guild members must follow guild rules and contribute positively to the community.

conduct.title: User Conduct
conduct.content1: Users must not use the service for any unlawful purpose or in violation of any local, state, national, or international law.
conduct.content2: Users must not transmit any worms, viruses, or any code of a destructive nature.
conduct.content3: Users must not engage in harassment, abuse, or discrimination against other users.
conduct.content4: GUILD reserves the right to terminate accounts that violate these conduct rules.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content1: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by GUILD and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
intellectual.content2: Users retain ownership of content they create and share on the platform.
intellectual.content3: By using our service, users grant GUILD a license to use, display, and distribute their content as necessary to provide the service.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content1: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the service.
privacy.content2: By using our service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content1: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability, under our sole discretion, for any reason whatsoever.
termination.content2: If you wish to terminate your account, you may simply discontinue using the service.
termination.content3: Upon termination, your right to use the service will cease immediately.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content1: In no event shall GUILD, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.
liability.content2: GUILD's total liability to you for all claims arising out of or relating to the use of or any inability to use any portion of the service shall not exceed the amount you paid to GUILD for the service in the twelve months prior to such claim.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content1: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these terms at any time.
changes.content2: If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content1: If you have any questions about these Terms & Conditions, please contact us at legal@guild.qa
contact.content2: For technical support, please visit our help center or contact support@guild.qa

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introDescription: This Privacy Policy explains how GUILD collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our services.
privacy.mustAccept: You must accept the privacy policy to continue
privacy.acceptanceText: I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy
privacy.declineWarning: You must accept the privacy policy to use GUILD. Are you sure you want to decline?
privacy.acceptanceError: Failed to save acceptance. Please try again.
privacy.contactDescription: Have questions about your privacy? Contact our privacy team.
privacy.downloadInfo: You can request a copy of your personal data. We'll email you a secure download link within 30 days.
privacy.deleteInfo: You can request deletion of your personal data. This action cannot be undone and will close your account.

overview.title: Privacy Overview
overview.content1: GUILD is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information.
overview.content2: This policy outlines what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your data.
overview.content3: By using GUILD, you consent to the data practices described in this policy.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content1: Account Information: Name, email address, phone number, profile picture, and professional details.
collection.content2: Usage Data: How you interact with our platform, including pages visited, features used, and time spent.
collection.content3: Device Information: Device type, operating system, browser information, and IP address.
collection.content4: Payment Information: Billing details and transaction history (payment data is processed by secure third-party providers).

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content1: To provide and improve our services, including job matching and guild functionality.
usage.content2: To communicate with you about your account, transactions, and platform updates.
usage.content3: To ensure platform security and prevent fraud or abuse.
usage.content4: To analyze usage patterns and improve user experience.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content1: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
sharing.content2: We may share information with service providers who help us operate the platform (payment processors, cloud storage, analytics).
sharing.content3: We may disclose information if required by law or to protect our rights and the safety of our users.

storage.title: Data Storage & Retention
storage.content1: Your data is stored securely using industry-standard encryption and security measures.
storage.content2: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services.
storage.content3: You can request deletion of your data at any time, subject to legal and contractual obligations.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.content1: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and analyze platform usage.
cookies.content2: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.
cookies.content3: Some features may not work properly if cookies are disabled.

rights.title: Your Privacy Rights
rights.content1: Access: You can request a copy of your personal data.
rights.content2: Correction: You can update or correct your information through your account settings.
rights.content3: Deletion: You can request deletion of your personal data.
rights.content4: Portability: You can request your data in a portable format.

security.title: Data Security
security.content1: We implement robust security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
security.content2: All data transmission is encrypted using SSL/TLS protocols.
security.content3: We regularly review and update our security practices to ensure your data remains protected.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content1: GUILD is not intended for users under 18 years of age.
children.content2: We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18.

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.content1: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own.
international.content2: We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data during international transfers.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements.
changes.content2: We will notify you of significant changes via email or platform notification.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content1: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or your personal data, contact us at privacy@guild.qa
contact.content2: For general inquiries, you can reach us at support@guild.qa

tutorial.title: Welcome to GUILD
tutorial.skipMessage: Are you sure you want to skip the tutorial? You can always access it later from settings.
tutorial.completeMessage: You're all set! Start exploring and connecting with skilled professionals.
tutorial.completeError: Failed to complete tutorial. Please try again.

welcome.title: Welcome to GUILD
welcome.description: Your gateway to professional freelancing and skill-based collaboration in the Gulf region.
welcome.feature1: Connect with skilled professionals across various industries
welcome.feature2: Post jobs or apply for opportunities that match your expertise
welcome.feature3: Build your professional reputation with our ranking system

jobs.title: Find & Post Jobs
jobs.description: Discover opportunities or share your projects with our vibrant community of professionals.
jobs.feature1: Browse jobs filtered by category, budget, and location
jobs.feature2: Post detailed job requirements with milestone tracking
jobs.feature3: Secure payment system with escrow protection

guilds.title: Join Guilds
guilds.description: Collaborate with like-minded professionals in specialized groups for bigger projects and skill development.
guilds.feature1: Join existing guilds or create your own professional community
guilds.feature2: Access guild-exclusive jobs and collaborative projects
guilds.feature3: Share knowledge and learn from experienced guild members

ranking.title: Build Your Rank
ranking.description: Progress from rank G to SSS based on your skills, completed tasks, and earnings to unlock better opportunities.
ranking.feature1: Start at rank G and work your way up to SSS
ranking.feature2: Higher ranks unlock premium jobs and better rates
ranking.feature3: Showcase your expertise with verified skill assessments

ready.title: You're Ready!
ready.description: Everything is set up for your success. Start building your professional network and growing your career.
ready.feature1: Complete your profile to attract better opportunities
ready.feature2: Enable notifications to never miss important updates
ready.feature3: Explore the app and discover all available features
